name: D.L. MILLER ENTERPRISES, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: D.L. MILLER ENTERPRISES, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Prior Report: 647 A.2d 905.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James A. Miller, Harrisburg, for D.L. Miller, Enterprises.
Linda S. Lloyd and James K. Bradley, Harrisburg, for U.C.B.R.
casebody.head_matter:
654 A.2d 527
D.L. MILLER ENTERPRISES, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 26, 1995.
Decided Feb. 14, 1995.
James A. Miller, Harrisburg, for D.L. Miller, Enterprises.
Linda S. Lloyd and James K. Bradley, Harrisburg, for U.C.B.R.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
